title: Samuel C. Deford Memorial Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship awards for students who are in active recovery and participating in the CU Collegiate Recovery Center.  Consideration or candidacy will be given to students pursing S.T.E.M. studies who have displayed a financial need.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship awards for students who are in active recovery and participating in the CU Collegiate Recovery Center. Consideration or candidacy will be given to students pursing S.T.E.M. studies who have displayed a financial need.
